QuestData.Title: Army of the Damned
QuestData.Description: You probably think you're quite strong -- fighting these undead and crushing their bones beneath your war machines.$B$BThat is nothing compared to the strength it took to create them.$B$BI saw the prince do it himself. I can show you how it happened... if you'd like.
QuestData.LogDescription: Matthias Lehner at the First Legion Forward Camp wants you to raise an army of 100 Ghoulish Minions.
QuestData.RewardText: The prince's true power wasn't his ability to make armies out of corpses... that was easy.$B$BBut killing his own men, with whom he'd shared many battles... the prince's true power was his ability to do what had to be done.
